 Mustex,Stallex,and Rhesus walk along the Sahara(don't ask where their
hover-cycles are)when suddenly the ground caved in under them. When 
they
stood up they were surprised to see a small spaceship.
Mustex:I thin-thin-think it mig-might be Ear-Early Ro-Rocak. Not the 
late
mind you,but still a 300 year technological quantum leap ahead of us.
 They walk inside and examine it.
Mustex:The good news is this ship could fly the 3 of us to Cybertron 
for
Maximal reinforcements. The bad news is the powercells are shot. The 
bonus
good news is that with this technology we can tap tousands of energy 
sources
on this planet. The bonus bad news is that the only one that will 
suffice in
less than 500 years is to drain it from animals,proto-humans,and 
other bots
and that's just cruel.
Stallex:If we want to be the best we have to make sacrifices.
Mustex:True.
 Mustex begins partially charging the ship woth some of his own 
energy.
Stallex:Just be careful not to drain to much.
Mustex:Just enough to pick up our wrecked hover-cycles(OHHH!),and 
maybe get a
lttle more power out of them.
